name: Bringer of Chaos (An Epic Chaos Shooter)
name_original: Bringer of Chaos (An Epic Chaos Shooter)
description:
IMPORTANT: If you would like to play the updated full version of the game with storyline, bug fixes and improved gameplay, please download from the specified link here: https://mega.nz/file/muhSXDYC#j9vzPylGOAmxyzYaW6XNaxW7GqrSroyzFrmTAtiIAWI

In the future when the jam ends, we shall update the itch.io game download link with this new version.

A storyline will be added into the game later but here's the gist:

An evil organization has captured most parts of the city and order has been vanquished. You set out to defeat this organization. However you were beaten up and your legs and hands were cut off. But, if you decide to strive on, even at a disabled state, maybe you have a chance of changing the city's fate?  Find out! 

(Since your body mass has reduced, the recoil force of your bullets are able to push you back, thus enabling you to move around, in a rather unexpected manner, Good luck!)

(Doors will be locked until you have killed enough enemies in the room)

Controls

Mouse - Shoot

ESC - Access Pause Menu With Options

R - Reload

Z - Bazooka

X - Health Regen

C - Shield

W - Jump
